main.name: Hi, I'm Thamal üòçüëã
main.description: Thamal is a skilled software engineer capable of leveraging his technical expertise to meet your specific needs.
main.bio: I am Thamal Wijetunge, Software Engineering specialized graduate from SLIIT, Colombo and a former Software Engineer at DP Infotech (Pvt) Ltd, Colombo. I am a confident and proactive person, possessing an analytical bent of mind. Positive approach and problem solving are my biggest assets. With exceptional planning, execution and interpersonal skills I am hard working , innovative and self-motivated team player, Also a software developer, interested in MERN stack, Android Application Developments, JavaScript, Asp.Net MVC C#, Oracle, Java, object oriented design patterns, ERP level developments and any kind of a development.
main.contactmessage: Contact me for your recruitments and other projects. Connect with me via social media.

resume.skillmessage: Some upto date technology skills are mentioned according to my best knowledge.

education.description:
‚Ä¢ Completed the 4th year research on Intelligent system for agriculture in Sri Lanka, using Android with Java and Python with Tensorflow lite.
‚Ä¢ Completed 3rd year project on implementing an e-commerce site using ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB. And completed several other projects as well.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
‚Ä¢ Completion of the Pearl Bay system with ERP and POS system for the David Pieris water park using ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS & MongoDB. 
‚Ä¢ Implemented new modules into the current ERP system. 
‚Ä¢ Implemented Management Accounts module into the current ERP system of David Pieris Group using JavaScript with jQuery, .NET Core & Oracle database.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description:
‚Ä¢ Full design and implementation of Pearl Bay system with ERP and POS system for the David Pieris water park using ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS & MongoDB. 
‚Ä¢ Drafted software requirements and managed software design and implementation. 
‚Ä¢ Developed, coordinated and conducted complex tests and debugged the systems. 
‚Ä¢ Managed software throughout SDLC and collaborated with team members to address issues. 
‚Ä¢ Implemented Workshop module into the current ERP system of David Pieris Group using JavaScript with jQuery, .NET Core & Oracle database.

work.title: Trainee Software Engineer
work.description:
‚Ä¢ Implemented new modules (Imports, Technical) into the current ERP system of David Pieris Group using JavaScript with jQuery, .NET Core & Oracle database.

projects.title: Mahaweli Agricultural App
projects.category: An Intelligent system for forecasting farmer's requirements in Mahaweli project. The research project which has been done in the 4th year of bachelors.

projects.title: Parcel Delivery Application
projects.category: A mobile driven implementation for a parcel delivery system. The android app can be used by senders, drivers and admins with specific roles. Rest services are used with Springboot.

projects.title: Online Shopping Cart System
projects.category: An e-commerce website for clothings. Application Frameworks Project, SLIIT, 3rd Year.
